column3: Position and cleanliness. Staff friendly and helpful.
Friendly host. Great breakfast. Perfect location.

Nice hotel in convenient location for exploring Ypres. Can walk to many bars, restaurants, sights, etc. Very friendly and helpful owners, gave good advice for sight-seeing. Simple breakfast due to current restrictions. Very nice and clean room with comfortable beds. On-street parking right outside hotel.
column4: A fan should be provided in the rooms in the hot summer.

No fridge in the room for storing food or drink.  Room was small and cramped.  No lift for carrying bags upstairs.  No ironing facilities.  On street parking was found but may be difficult in busy times.

column3: Breakfast was excellent English and Continental choice with pleasant staff.
column4: Steep stairs! I was on the 2nd floor.

column3: The welcome from the owners. Pebbles at breakfast!! Lovely breakfast

Hotel Ambrosia was perfect for our purposes. It's very close to the centre of Ypres, the room was spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was very tasty too. The couple that run the hotel are very friendly and helpful.
